column5: here it is.. http://www.canadiantire.ca/browse/product_...fromSearch=true http://canadiantire.shoplocal.com/canadian...p;pagenumber=48 reg at $299.99 or "Dash-in & Save 2-Day Sale" and save 40%, making it at $174.99 during dec 8 & 9. maybe a good unit for you ice fishermen out there..    btw, cliff, should i get some kind of commission for this?
